ComicInfo.Title: Tom Jones; First Prize, Man!; Cracked's Travel Agency Tourist Attractions; Awards to Unsung Heroes; The Painter's Fantasy; Cracked Looks at Television Viewers; 65-Man Klonkball; The Frog Prince; Tiny Tim's Wedding Reception; The Status Symbol Rat Race; Luck Is; Gadgets Go Hollywood; Boy Scouts; Krakaknuckle East of Hoboken!
ComicInfo.Summary: Hudd and Dini try to escape prison by disguising themselves as Boy Scouts but the guard disguises himself as an old lady they try to help.
